name: CandyBeats
description:
Only Arrow keys Press the correct arrow when a candy is over it

Your goal is to dance to gain to candy for Halloween ! 

CandyNotes are generated randomly so you can restart indefinitely ! >:D

This game was realized in 2 days, for the miniJam 28 on the theme of Food with the limitation: only arrow keys.
The music is not from me be, but it is good news for you !

I hope you will enjoy it :)
